characters.description: A large android constructed long ago by some lost civilization. Sporting a cone-shaped drill for a right hand and a rusty needle for a left.
A large mass of coiling twisting vines, occasionally a bunch of leaves surface that pantomime facial expressions.
A huge plant monster that wears a bakers hat, it usually carries around a spatula that was grown from it's own body, and can dispense maple syrup.
An enormous yellow and brown bat with zigzag patterns in it's fur.
Imagine a roadrunner and a monster truck fused. Now give it magical speed powers.
A large black and white wolf cub with an orca tail.
This confetti-colored piglet is regularly coated in rich resistant muds. This multicolored mud hardens and then becomes animate like a second skin.
This tiny hell pup thinks it is the top dog everywhere it goes. It has three heads, obisidan colored fur, and red colored eyes, which means it is absolutely adorable.

this creature reeks like a not-so-clean overused biology lab. It's bean shaped bio-suit sits atop 4 bizarre twitching legs. Inside the large visor there's a bubbling black and green slime that occasionally reveals alien facial features. A series of bionic arms on the sides and front of the suit occasionally inflate when needed.

A short stocky creature in rangers attire wielding 2 throwing axes. His face is largely obstructed by long red hair and a bushy beard, what is visible depicts a stern face, with one eye scratched out.
a child-size fresh faced knight in leathers and a breastplate. He carries a short sword, longsword and shield.
A brain in a jar possessing strange psychic abilities.
A floating aura of purple mist surrounding a hard shelled, crystal-like orb. The orb is known to be the true body of the creature.
A fluffy 12 year old sheep satyr with rainbow irridescent horns.
The left side of this creature's body looks like a demons, and the right side looks like an angels.

This Hydra is still in it's infant stages of life. It currently has 3 heads, each capable of a different attack. It's purple in color, and has a green underbody. All of it's heads have a different colored set of eyes.
a little origami paper person
A large brightly colored fish with a large mouth and red lips. Its scales shimmer with a magical fervor.
A large, featureless sphere of light.
A living d20 wearing a wizard hat and adventuring gear.
